name: Itsy Bitsy Spider (Bunny Kim, alirezafatemi)
description:
This was a project from Game Jam course held at Aalto University. The project duration is 5 days. The Jam topic was "twist".

We took inspiration from Google Chrome Dinosaur game and added a thematic and mechanical twist. The spider is the protagonist running in the air duct looking for delicious cookies while avoiding scary obstacles like lemon, fire, and slimes. The spider jumps from floor to ceiling to avoid hazards and find cookies.

Team

Ahmad Erfani: Programmer

Alireza Fatemi: Programmer

Boeun Kim: Artist

Marija Šumarac: Sound Designer
